result.reason: This is a clear user-facing enhancement with maintainer-positive feedback and can be built on top of the existing duplicate-node workflow.
result.approach: Add a new 'Create Link' action that stores a reference to an existing connection and reuses the target settings at runtime instead of deep-cloning properties.
